text: Sri Sukhmani International School is a higher-secondary co-education private school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 1991 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:International schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in India
title: Sri Sukhmani International School
